isTrue

public static void isTrue(boolean test)
Asserts that the test argument is true. If not, it throws an AssertionFailedException.

Parameters:
test - Test argument.

isTrue

public static void isTrue(boolean test,
                          String errorMessage)

Parameters:
test - Test argument.
errorMessage - The error message.

isTrue

public static void isTrue(boolean test,
                          String errorMessage,
                          int linenumber)
Assert that the test argument is true. If not, it throws an AssertionFailedException with the given errorMessage and the given linenumber.

Parameters:
test - Test argument.
errorMessage - The error message.
linenumber - The line number to show in the error message.

errorMessage - The error message.

throwAssertionFailure

protected static void throwAssertionFailure(String errorMessage,
                                            int pop)
Throws an AssertionFailedException with the given errorMessage while popping the number of items from the stack trace. This gives the impression that the exception is generated from the caller's code.

Parameters:
errorMessage - The error message.
pop - How many items must be popped off the stack trace.

fail

public static void fail(String errorMessage)
Throws an AssertionFailedException with the given errorMessage.

Parameters:
errorMessage - The error message.

public static void fail()
Throws an AssertionFailedException.

errorMessage - The error message.

notEmpty

public static void notEmpty(Collection collection)
Assert that the collection is not null and not empty. If not, an AssertionFailedException is thrown.

Parameters:
collection - The collection to be checked for not emptiness.

public static void notBlank(String test)

Parameters:
test - Test argument.

isInstanceOf

public static void isInstanceOf(Object object,
                                Class type)
Asserts that the object is an instance of the class. If not, an AssertionFailedException is thrown.

Parameters:
object - The object of which the type is checked.
type - The type to be checked.

notInstanceOf

public static void notInstanceOf(Object object,
                                 Class type)
Asserts that the object is not an instance of the class. If it is, an AssertionFailedException is thrown.

Parameters:
object - The object of which the type is checked.
type - The type to be checked.
